title: Update payment and chatbot backgrounds, reposition elements, mask phone number, add earnings dashboard and withdrawal requests

requirements.text: Change PaymentModal component background from transparent to solid black (#000000). Update the modal container styling to use a solid black background instead of the current transparent or semi-transparent background.

quotes: Payment wale ko transparent se black background

acceptanceCriteria: PaymentModal background is solid black (#000000)
Modal content remains visible with appropriate contrast
Theme-aware styling preserved for text and elements

requirements.text: Change EvergreenAIChatbot component background to solid black (#000000). Update the chatbot interface container to use a solid black background instead of any transparent or glassmorphism effects.

quotes: evergreen.ai ko bhi black background do

acceptanceCriteria: Chatbot interface background is solid black (#000000)
Chat messages and interface elements maintain readability
Black background applies to both collapsed button and expanded chat interface

requirements.text: Reposition EvergreenAIChatbot floating button to the left side of the viewport. Change the positioning from right side to left side while maintaining appropriate spacing from edges and ensuring it doesn't overlap with other UI elements.

quotes: evergreen.ai ko left side move kardo

acceptanceCriteria: Chatbot floating button appears on the left side of the viewport
Button maintains appropriate spacing from left edge and bottom
Draggable functionality continues to work after repositioning
No overlap with FloatingWhatsAppButton on the right side

requirements.text: Update FloatingWhatsAppButton component background to solid black (#000000). Change the button background styling to use a solid black background.
acceptanceCriteria: FloatingWhatsAppButton has solid black background
WhatsApp icon remains visible with appropriate contrast
Hover effects and animations continue to work
Button remains easily identifiable as WhatsApp contact

requirements.text: Mask phone number 9263989760 throughout the application to display only the last 2 digits, showing as '********60'. Make the masked number clickable, opening WhatsApp or phone dialer with the full phone number when clicked. Apply masking to all instances: FloatingWhatsAppButton, Footer, HeroSection, VideoEditingSection, PaymentProofForm, and any other components displaying the phone number.

quotes: Mera number masked type kar do but clickable ho bss last ka 2 ank dekhe

acceptanceCriteria: Phone number displays as '********60' wherever shown
Masked number is clickable and opens WhatsApp with full number 9263989760
Masking applied consistently across all components
Clicking maintains existing pre-filled message functionality
Visual styling indicates the number is clickable (hover effects, cursor pointer)

requirements.text: After successful login, redirect authenticated users directly to the user dashboard (/dashboard) instead of the homepage. Update the Login page and authentication flow to navigate to /dashboard upon successful authentication.

quotes: login ke baad dashboard aana chahiye

acceptanceCriteria: Login page redirects to /dashboard after successful authentication
Redirection works for both regular login and Internet Identity authentication
Users land on Dashboard Overview page showing their earnings

requirements.text: Create an Earnings Dashboard section in the user Dashboard Overview page displaying four earnings metrics: Today's Earning, Weekly Earning, Monthly Earning, and Lifetime Earning. Display each metric in a separate card with emerald green accents, showing the earnings amount in INR (₹). Use a responsive grid layout that adapts to mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports.

quotes: usme uska earning dikhna chahiye today uske baad weekly earning fir monthly uske baad lifetime earning dikhe

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard Overview displays four earnings cards: Today, Weekly, Monthly, Lifetime
Each card shows the earning amount in INR format (₹)
Cards use emerald green accent colors consistent with theme
Layout is responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop
Earnings cards appear at the top of the Dashboard Overview page

requirements.text: Add backend support for earnings tracking and retrieval. Implement data structures to store and calculate user earnings (today, weekly, monthly, lifetime) and create a backend function to retrieve earnings data for authenticated users. Initialize earnings data when users make approved purchases.

quotes: usme uska earning dikhna chahiye today uske baad weekly earning fir monthly uske baad lifetime earning dikhe

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores earnings data associated with user Principal
Function calculates today's, weekly, monthly, and lifetime earnings
Earnings update when payment proofs are approved
API returns earnings data in format consumable by frontend

requirements.text: Add a Withdrawal Request feature to the user dashboard. Create a new page or section where users can submit withdrawal questions or requests. Include a form with fields for withdrawal amount and message/question, and a submit button. Display a list of the user's previous withdrawal requests with status (pending/approved/rejected) and submission date.

quotes: wo withdrawal ke liye question bhej sake

acceptanceCriteria: User dashboard includes Withdrawal Request navigation item
Withdrawal request form allows users to submit amount and message
Users can view their previous withdrawal requests with status
Form validation ensures valid amount and message input
Success message displayed after submission

requirements.text: Implement backend support for withdrawal requests. Create a WithdrawalRequest data structure with fields: id, userId, amount, message, status (pending/approved/rejected), createdAt. Add backend functions to create new withdrawal requests, list requests by user, list all requests (admin), and update request status (admin only).

quotes: wo withdrawal ke liye question bhej sake

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores withdrawal requests with user association
Users can create new withdrawal requests
Users can retrieve their own withdrawal requests
Admins can view and update status of all withdrawal requests
Requests are timestamped with creation date

requirements.text: Add a Landing Page Builder/Creator option to the user dashboard. Create a new navigation item and page that allows users to build or customize landing pages. The page should provide a user-friendly interface for creating landing pages, potentially with templates or customization options.

quotes: landing page banane wala bhi option wahi dena

acceptanceCriteria: User dashboard includes Landing Page Builder navigation item
Landing Page Builder page is accessible to authenticated users
Interface provides tools or options for creating/customizing landing pages
Users can save and preview their created landing pages
Created landing pages are associated with user account

requirements.text: Implement backend support for user-created landing pages. Create data structures to store landing page configurations (title, content, template selection, customizations) and add backend functions to create, retrieve, update, and delete user landing pages. Associate landing pages with user Principal for ownership.

quotes: landing page banane wala bhi option wahi dena

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores landing page data associated with users
Users can create multiple landing pages
Users can retrieve, update, and delete their own landing pages
Landing page data includes customizable fields (title, content, template)
Backend validates user ownership before allowing modifications

requirements.text: Add an admin Withdrawal Management page to the admin dashboard. Create a page listing all user withdrawal requests in a table with columns: User Name, Amount (₹), Message, Status, Submission Date, and Actions. Implement approve/reject buttons for each request and include filtering by status (All/Pending/Approved/Rejected). Add a navigation item in the admin sidebar for Withdrawal Management.

quotes: wo withdrawal ke liye question bhej sake

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard includes Withdrawal Management navigation item
Table displays all withdrawal requests with user details
Admins can approve or reject withdrawal requests
Status filter allows viewing by All/Pending/Approved/Rejected
Actions update withdrawal request status in real-time
Success/error messages displayed after status changes

constraints: Maintain single-actor architecture in backend with all logic in main.mo
Do not edit immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*
Preserve existing green and black theme with emerald accents
Maintain integration with existing ThemeContext for light/dark mode support
Keep existing WhatsApp functionality (9263989760) fully operational
Ensure all new features work with existing authentication (Internet Identity)
Maintain responsive mobile-first design across all viewport sizes
nonGoals: Changing the core technology stack (React, Motoko, Tailwind)
Removing or disabling existing features not mentioned in the request
Adding new payment gateways or payment processors
Adding third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity
Creating a full WYSIWYG editor for landing page builder (basic interface is sufficient)
Implementing automated earnings calculations based on affiliate conversions (manual approval-based earnings are sufficient)
